TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CacheRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定在获得 时，UI 自动化框架缓存的属性和模式。

span.span: Specifies properties and patterns that the UI Automation framework caches when an is obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]检索属性和模式需要跨进程调用, 从而降低性能。Retrieving properties and patterns through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] requires cross-process calls that can slow down performance. 通过在批处理操作中缓存 microsoft.support 和模式的值, 你可以提高应用程序的性能。By caching values of proprieties and patterns in a batch operation, you can enhance the performance of your application. 通过调用类构造函数来创建新的缓存请求。Create a new cache request by calling the class constructor. 该请求通过对方法的重复调用来填充。The request is populated by repeated calls to the method. 只有一个可以处于活动状态。 Only a single can be active. 可以通过两种方式激活请求:There are two ways to activate a request: - 请求上调用。Call on the request. 这会将请求推送到堆栈上, 并在释放对象时弹出请求。This pushes the request onto the stack, and the request is popped when the object is disposed. 若要确保即使引发异常也能进行处理, 请使用 `using`块中的返回值 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal even if an exception is raised, use the return value from within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). - 通过调用将请求放到内部堆栈上。Put the request onto the internal stack by calling . 堆栈上只有最顶层的请求处于活动状态, 并且必须是从堆栈中移除的下一个请求。Only the topmost request on the stack is active, and it must be the next one removed from the stack by . 弹出请求会将其停用。Popping the request deactivates it. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]请求处于活动状态时获得的元素将为指定的属性和模式使用缓存值。elements obtained while the request is active will have cached values for the properties and patterns specified. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)] 下面的示例演示如何使用和来缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use and to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

related.span: 在 UI 自动化客户端中缓存
在 UI 自动化中使用缓存

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 将此 设置为在同一线程中请求 时返回的项的活动规范。

span.span: Sets this as the active specification for the items that are returned when an is requested on the same thread.

returns.span: 可用于释放 的对象。

span.span: The object that can be used to dispose the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 使用此方法比使用和作为激活的一种方法。Using this method is usually preferable to using and as a means of activating the . 对象在调用时被推送到堆栈上, 然后在被释放时弹出。The object is pushed onto the stack when is called, and then popped off when it is disposed. 若要确保处置, 请将返回值`using`放在块中 (`Using` Visual Basic)。To ensure disposal, place the return value within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建对象时, 会将标识符作为默认属性添加到缓存中。 When a object is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache. 添加已在缓存请求中的对象不起作用。Adding an object that is already in the cache request has no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定返回的元素是应包含对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用，还是仅包含缓存的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether returned elements should contain full references to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], or only cached information.

value.span: 如果返回的元素包含对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为默认值, 并指定返回的元素包含对基础[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的完整引用。 is the default value, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 指定返回的元素没有引用基础[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素, 只包含缓存的信息。 specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and contain only cached information. 对元素执行的某些操作( 包括、 和) 需要完整引用; 尝试对中的无结果的元素执行这些操作。Certain operations on elements, including , , and , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 当只需要属性时, 使用可能更高效, 因为这样可以避免设置完整引用所涉及的系统开销。Using can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 在下面的示例中 , 将设置为, 并且只有缓存的属性和模式可用于检索到的对象。In the following example, is set to , with the result that only cached properties and patterns are available for the retrieved object. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pop() cil managed

summary.span: 从当前线程的内部堆栈中移除活动的 。

span.span: Removes the active from the internal stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法只能删除当前活动的请求。Only the currently active request can be removed using the method. 如果尝试删除不是当前请求的请求, 将导致异常。Attempting to remove a request that is not the current one results in an exception. 除非要嵌套缓存请求, 否则最好使用将请求放在堆栈上。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因在于, 你可以在 `using`块中使用 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中), 确保即使引发了异常, 也可以从堆栈中弹出请求。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 停用。The following example shows how to deactivate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

exception.span: 尝试移除的缓存请求不是最后压入堆栈的堆栈请求。

span.span: An attempt was made to remove a cache request that was not the last one pushed onto the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Push() cil managed

summary.span: 将 压入内部状态堆栈，并使它成为当前线程中的活动请求。

span.span: Places the on the internal state stack, making it the active request on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将多个对象置于状态堆栈上。Multiple objects can be placed onto the state stack. 必须按推送缓存请求的顺序将其从堆栈中移除;否则, 将引发异常。Cache requests must be removed from the stack in the order they were pushed on; otherwise, an exception is raised. 除非要嵌套缓存请求, 否则最好使用将请求放在堆栈上。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因在于, 你可以在 `using`块中使用 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中), 确保即使引发了异常, 也可以从堆栈中弹出请求。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 激活。The following example shows how to activate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定缓存时要使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素树的视图。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree to use when caching.
The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树的视图的其他信息, 请参阅[UI 自动化树概述](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md)。For additional information on views of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree, see [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中 , 将设置为, 以便对所有元素执行缓存, 而不管它们是内容视图还是控件视图的一部分。In the following example, is set to so that caching is done for all elements, regardless of whether they are part of the content view or the control view. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是仅对子树的根进行缓存，还是也对其子级或子代进行缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether caching is done only for the root of the subtree, or also for its children or descendants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的作用域与要提取的对象或对象相关, 而不是与在其上调用或的对象相关。The scope of caching is in relation to the object or objects being fetched, not in relation to the object on which or is called. 请参阅示例。See the example. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 当处于活动状态且为时, 从父窗口元素获取一个列表框元素。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 子元素的指定属性 (即列表项) 存储在缓存中, 可以从列表框的中进行检索。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#119)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#119)]

exception.span: 尝试将该属性设置为 或 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to or .
